---
title: iplotRF within R Markdown
output: html_document
---

This document serves to test the
[R/qtlcharts](https://kbroman.org/qtlcharts/) function `iplotRF`.

```{r load_data, message=FALSE}
set.seed(69891250)
library(qtl)
library(qtlcharts)
data(grav)
```


### iplotRF

```{r iplotRF, fig.width=9, fig.height=9}
gravsub <- pull.markers(grav, sample(markernames(grav), 50, replace=FALSE))
gravsub <- est.rf(gravsub)
iplotRF(gravsub)
```
